name: Frontline Fury Commando
description:
You are a well-trained Commando of a rebel assault against deadly enemies, you are stranded on the bleeding edge and never going to budge on payback. You should utilize the greater part of your specific abilities to survive the assault of the foe compels and retaliate for your fallen troopers. Arm yourself with lethal professional killer rifleman weapons, attack rifles, assault rifles and the most recent military apparatus to finish incognito battle missions. So go ahead Commando, kill your treacherous enemies and save the area

Features:
• War survival & thrilling sniping missions
• Challenging FPS sniper experience
• Zoom, aim shoot, kill and win the sniper battle
• Heart pounding sound effects
• Realistic environment and stunning 3d graphics
